actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Boat Safety Act of 1971 in order to provide for an annual "National Safe Boating Week".

summary.text: Amends the Federal Boat Safety Act of 1971 to authorize the President to proclaim annually one week as "National Safe Boating Week". Repeals the Act, which placed "National Safe Boating Week" during the first week of July.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Boat Safety Act of 1971 in order to provide for an annual "National Safe Boating Week".
